data.message: Eminem is not the greatest rapper ever, he is definitely top 25, in fact there is no greatest rapper but 90% of you Eminem fans listen to drake,future, and all that bullshit so you wouldn't know

replies.message: Dumb ass alert. No one here listens to Future or Drake smh
How about you read all the comments saying "drake is good, but em will destroy his career" or" I like oth of them, glad their beef didn't go anywhere" you dumb piece of shit
Not best rapper, but I would say best (signed) rapper alive.
You're like 10! You weren't even around when Eminem was hot! Even I knew he was the greatest and still is and I'm 28 you were still a baby then.
Name you're top ten rappers bitch let's see if you know a thing about rap or not
